formatDescription: WordPerfect is a word processor application currently owned by Corel. Applications implementing the libwpd library should be able to render older WordPerfect documents. WordPerfect documents created within a Macintosh environment are likely to lack a format extension.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

internalSignatures.name: WordPerfect for Mac 2.x
internalSignatures.note: Word Perfect magic: 0xFF'WPC', {4} Product code 0x01=Word Perfect, File Type 0x2C=MAC WP, File Format Major Version 0x02=2 - http://www.columbia.edu/~em36/wpdos/WPMac4FileFormat.pdf
